name: Car Wash Game for Kids and Toddlers
name_original: Car Wash Game for Kids and Toddlers
description:
Looking for the ultimate children's car game?

Your child likes cars, vehicles, trucks and should have fun, laugh and learn important things at the same time?



LEARN:
* Logical thinking
* Hand-eye coordination
* Goal-oriented thinking
* How to use the computer mouse and PC
* Decision making skills



Then our educational, high-quality cars and trucks fun game for children and toddlers is the perfect game. In the game, children can select between a range of different vehicles. They can then clean the dirty cars and trucks by using a range of funny cleaning tools. Like a mechanic or doctor they can choose which action they want to perform on the cars. For every action they will get a reward in the form of a collectable star. These stars can be used to make cars and vehicles dirty again in many creative ways.



Important: The game contains no links or advertising and is completely child-safe!

Surprise your child today with our funny cars game.

Your McPeppergames team
